dublin_core.dcvalue: There is concern regarding the possible health effects of cellular telephone use We examined whether the source of funding of studies of the effects of low level radiofrequency radiation is associated with the results of studies We conducted a systematic review of studies of controlled exposure to radiofrequency radiation with health related outcomes electroencephalogram cognitive or cardiovascular function hormone levels symptoms and subjective well being
Source of funding and results of studies of health effects of mobile phone use: systematic review of experimental studies.
